title: Substitution in Function
text: How can we substitute 6 into the equation? We can replace x with 6 in the given function expression.

title: Taking the Square Root.
text: What is $$\sqrt{16}$$, what can be multiplied by itself to get 16? $$4\times4=16$$, so $$\sqrt{16}=4$$. Therefore $$f(6)=4$$.
